input.sentences: the baking date was fun for everyone .
they took time to take photos between mixing .
there were plenty of varieties of sweets to choose from .
a black and white photo was made to create a unique memory of the event .
output.sentences: Margaret loved cooking parties with her friends.
They all had so much fun goofing off, pigging out and staying up late.
Some of them even had a few beers -- or maybe more than a few.
No matter what, though, the food was always delicious.
For Margaret, it always proved to be a night to remember.
